table-entry.name: steel
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) primary key,BUILDNAME VARCHAR(200),OWNER VARCHAR(200),TIME VARCHAR(200),NORMS VARCHAR(100),RENTERTYPE VARCHAR(100),NUM DECIMAL(12,8),UNITPRICE DECIMAL(12,8)

table-entry.name: fastening
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,name varchar(200),mobile varchar(20),email varchar(100)
